duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure excellence in guest satisfaction through commitment to a "Do Whatever It Takes Attitude" and a hands-on, lead by example management style
Utilize leadership skills and motivate employees to ensure cost control and labor management
Inspect establishment and observe workers and guests to ensure compliance with occupational, health, and safety standards and regulations
Ensure paperwork accuracy such as daily sales summary reports, petty cash reimbursement forms, and payroll records

education_certification.credential: At least 2+ years of upscale/fine dining restaurant management experience
